channel.title: How do I change the ip the server starts on?
channel.description:
Like when I start my server, it says "starting server on 0.0.0.0, port 43594" or "starting server on 0.0.0.0->43594" but, I want it to come from my ip adress so I can tell people to join. Does any one know how to change that? If you do please post and explain.
thankz
Your friend,
pwn3d

item.title: How do I change the ip the server starts on?
item.dc:creator: @masterjman masterjman
item.description:
@masterjman wrote:

you don’t need to it will work fine set to localhost it dose for me if you can"T on check your router

item.title: How do I change the ip the server starts on?
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

You’d have to move to a different country, because in this one 0.0.0.0 is localhost.
